projects.title: To-Do-List
projects.description: This is a simple To-Do List application built using Python's Tkinter and SQLite for persistent data storage. It allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as done, with a clean UI featuring a dark green and sandal color scheme. Tasks are stored in an SQLite database, ensuring they persist after closing the application.
projects.name: Manoj Kumar
